item.description:
Folks,

Steve Schulz was a dead broke school teacher. He knew, just like other people, that he had to do something to supplement his income. One night, his best friend came over showing him some telecom services that everyone can use and a compensation plan. His friend asked, "Tell me why this won't work?" They analyzed the comp plan until 1am until Steve's wife came out and said, "For a few hundred dollars, what if it does work?

Come learn how you can use this business in combination with your real estate business. This company gives you all the tools you need to be successful with your real estate business! And, create an additional stream of income in the process. Like Than Merrill says, "Affiliate programs are phenomenal, refer your clients to people who can help them and make additional streams of income!

He was looking...JUST LIKE YOU! After a year, he replaced his wife's teaching income and within 3 years he made enough money to walk away from his teaching position. He is now a highly documented expert in the industry. Want to meet him? Want to learn how he did it? Want to learn about the exciting new technology that is putting us in front of the next trend in technology!

WHEN: Tuesday 6/8 - Meet the 14 Million Dollar Man and learn how he did it!
6:30 - Networking/snacks/refreshments
7:30 - Overview

WHERE: FDI Training Center, 1 Industrial Dr, Windham, NH

RSVP: To attend this presentation for free, please call Bernadette at 603-505-8683 and visit www.newFDIVoice.com to learn more about our company.

****Can't get to Windham??? Still interested? Call Bernadette at 603-505-8683
item.how_to_find_us: Go to the center entrance of the building - FDI Training Center

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Meet school teacher who went from dead broke to multi-millionaire!
